long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
ğŸ”Š Revitalize your Tubi experience with 'Voice Control for Tubi'ğŸš€, an innovative Chrome extension that enables voice command control of Tubi. Play, pause, fast-forward, and more, all without lifting a finger! ğŸ™ŒğŸ¬

Main Features:
ğŸ—£ï¸ Voice Control for Tubi: Control Tubi with simple voice commands. With the voice control extension, watching your favorite series and movies becomes even easier!
ğŸŒ Support for Voice Commands in 8 Languages: Whether you speak English, Spanish, French, German, Polish, Japanese, Korean, or Thai, our extension will understand your commands.
ğŸ‘¤ Command Customization: Tailor voice commands to your preferences. Instead of the standard 'Tubi play', set your own phrases to activate specific functions.
ğŸ”Œ Easy Installation and Use: Simply install the extension and start playing any video on Tubi. Your streaming experience will be transformed.
ğŸ–¥ï¸ Compatibility with Chrome Devices: Works perfectly with any device using the Chrome browser.

Supported Commands:
â¯ï¸ Pause / Play: Easily manage your video playback.
â©âª Skip Forward / Backward: Fast-forward or rewind videos effortlessly.
ğŸ”‡ğŸ”Š Mute / Volume Up / Down: Control the volume without the need for a remote or keyboard.
ğŸ“º Next Episode: Automatically move to the next episode of your favorite series.

âš™ï¸ The Control Panel Pop-up gives access to settings and command customization.

For Whom:
ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ‘§â€ğŸ‘¦ Perfect for any Tubi fan looking for a more convenient and innovative way to control their favorite content. Whether you have limited mobility or simply appreciate convenience and modern solutions, our extension is for you.

Get Started:
ğŸŒŸ Transform the way you watch Tubi today. Install 'Voice Control for Tubi' and enjoy the freedom that voice commands offer! ğŸ’¬ğŸ‰

â—**Disclaimer: All product and company names are trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective holders. This extension holds no association or affiliation with them or any third-party companies.**â—
